actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide direct aid to the States and territories for educational purposes only for the benefit of the taxpayers and local governments.

summary.text: Directs that two percent of all Federal income taxes collected within a State or territory be transferred as revenue to such State or territory for educational purposes, free of any Federal control.

titles.title: A bill to provide direct aid to the States and territories for educational purposes only for the benefit of the taxpayers and local governments.
